title: Amazon Essentials Men's Flannel Shirts, Long-Sleeve, Slim-Fit, Two-Pocket, Plaid
description: SLIM FIT FLANNEL SHIRT MEN'S DESIGN: Offers a tailored look through the shoulders, chest, and waist for a modern silhouette that complements any style, ideal for enthusiasts of men's fall shirts
SOFT AND DURABLE FABRIC: Made from 100% brushed cotton twill, these men's flannel shirts provide comfort and warmth without adding bulk
VERSATILE WEAR: Perfect for pairing with jeans or khakis, this men's flannel shirt transitions seamlessly from casual outings to layering up for cooler days
DESIGN DETAILS: Features a straight collar, button-up front, and adjustable buttoned cuffs, offering practical style in men's button down long sleeve shirts with every wear
DUAL CHEST POCKETS: Includes two chest pockets with button-through flaps in men's long sleeve button down shirts

This flannel shirt men love is made from 100% brushed cotton flannel, ensuring a cozy feel perfect for any season, especially as one of your go-to men's fall shirts. The slim fit cut flatters the shoulders, chest, and waist, making it an ideal choice for long sleeve shirts that provide a modern silhouette. Our men's flannel shirts come with a straight collar, button-up front placket, and adjustable buttoned cuffs, offering versatile style, whether you prefer a polished or laid-back look. With double chest pockets featuring button-through flaps, this casual shirt for men not only looks great but also brings functionality. Perfect for layering or wearing alone, this long sleeve flannel makes an excellent addition to your collection of casual shirts.
